name: FrederickScanner
0:
”Alexa, play Frederick Scanner”
”Alexa, start Frederick Scanner”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: frederick scanner
des: The Frederick Scanner is an audio feed of Frederick Maryland Police, Fire and EMS. This skill allows you to listen to two versions of the audio. One is a mixture of Police, Fire and EMS (our main feed). The other is our Fire only feed. To listen say, “Alexa, start Frederick Scanner” which will start the main feed. To listen to the fire only feed, “Alexa, ask Frederick Scanner to start Fire only”.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
